Why is this number 1?

OK, first of all, you just mentioned like 5 different things that would NOT fit in with anything else in Minecraft, and second of all, Mojang will NOT add FNaF characters. FNaF is by Scott Cauthan, Minecraft is by Mojang. If you want FNaF in Minecraft, download an add-on.

With the food, furniture- surely it would be easier to make them part of the game. Making them mods would surely be more complex.

And no FNAF: FNAF is rubbish and we don‚Äôt need any FNAF stuff!

Is this even on the developers radar! It‚Äôs one of my main ways to play the game. It takes forever to do anything now.

This needs to be fixed immediately. Completely ruins the game for a lot of people. Just give us an option to toggle it - simple as that. I remember before the update, even typing without a USB keyboard, Minecraft still allowed me to watch the live input in the chat. It‚Äôs beyond me how an issue like this can go unnoticed for so long. Please fix this interaction with the Xbox on-screen keyboard ASAP.

So firstly who patches the xp from furnaces clearly doesnt play minecraft! Secondly minecraft is a childs game that used to be enjoyable for all ages  that is no longer enjoyable to play. Young children die in game constantly and lose everything. Survival mode in 1.18.12 lol more (xp grind) for hours until you are bored and hate the game. Who wants to spend 4hrs to get to level 30 what a joke and that's if you dont die first. Looooooool. My children no longer want to play this game. Vastly disappointing MOJANG. Looks like this is the end for Minecraft Bedrock!
